Articles.Content:
Hey Everyone!

AtomicTech here,

I'm going to try to start playing a career game (for the third time) but I don't want to follow the original tech tree progression. I really like the concept from RP-1 that glorifies early Aircraft contracts and small suborbital flights instead of the Stock progression we've all come to know.

So this brings me to my question, are there any mods (or collections of mods) that might give me a RP-1-esqe progression for a stock game?

There are some tech tree rearrangement mods that might meet your requirements: Probes before Crew, UnKerballed Start, Unmanned before Manned are just some of them, try them out and see which you like best (and still works, some of those are quite old and may not work in current KSP).

On 1/9/2022 at 2:12 AM, jimmymcgoochie said:

There are some tech tree rearrangement mods that might meet your requirements: Probes before Crew, UnKerballed Start, Unmanned before Manned are just some of them, try them out and see which you like best (and still works, some of those are quite old and may not work in current KSP).

Thanks! I'll look into it!

Some people recommend PBC and such as you see here but I recommend getting LRTR as it essentially is RP-1 for stock and KSRSS it includes the construction time, the need to give Kerbals courses, contracts and other such things.
